p:
The purpose of the travel module is to generate the temporal travel matrix Θ representing flow of people between the patches (i.e., counties) on a daily basis. Each entry
Θ
i j
t
of the travel matrix represents the fraction of individuals in patch i spending their time in patch j on day t. The travel matrix Θ is synthesized using datasets pertaining to commuter flow and domestic airline traffic. These datasets are visualized in Fig 2.
